tokentrading
Class TokenTrader

java.lang.Object
  tokentrading.TokenTrader
Direct Known Subclasses:
GlobalTokenTrader, NoTokenTrader, ProfitTokenTrader
public abstract class TokenTrader
extends java.lang.Object

The TokenTrader class is used to specify particular policies that individual gates will use to trade tokens Instances contain information such as which gate they are trading tokens for, what to do when a token request is received, and what to do when tokens are low

Constructor Summary
TokenTrader(Gate tokenTrader)
          Instantiates a TokenTrader as being responsible for a particular Gate
 
Method Summary
abstract  int onTokenRequestReceived()
          Gets how many tokens to send when a token request is received.
abstract  int requestTokens()
          Gets the number of tokens that should be requested by a given gate This number is decided based on the number of tokens a gate currently has and the particular polciy
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

TokenTrader

public TokenTrader(Gate tokenTrader)
Instantiates a TokenTrader as being responsible for a particular Gate

Parameters:
tokenTrader - The gate which this TokenTrader will use to trade
Method Detail

onTokenRequestReceived

public abstract int onTokenRequestReceived()
Gets how many tokens to send when a token request is received. Uses the current number of tokens that the gate has as a baseline along with the particular policy

Returns:
The number of tokens that the gate should send to whoever sent the token request

requestTokens

public abstract int requestTokens()
Gets the number of tokens that should be requested by a given gate This number is decided based on the number of tokens a gate currently has and the particular polciy

Returns:
The number of tokens that this gate needs to request
